subject: Drug Abuse and Traffic
Marijuana
Football
Drunken and Reckless Driving
Traffic Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: San Francisco’s Aldon Smith was arrested Friday on suspicion of driving under the influence and marijuana possession, after his truck was involved in an accident.
snippet: San Francisco’s Aldon Smith was arrested Friday on suspicion of driving under the influence and marijuana possession, after his truck was involved in an accident.
